byline.original: Video by SCILLA ALECCI and GEORGE STEPTOE

headline.main: Harassment and Attacks From Fellow Officers in U.S. Prisons

keywords.value: Little Sandy Correctional Complex (Elliott County, Ky)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Female officers regularly face sexual harassment by colleagues and superiors, and a fear of retaliation stops many from reporting incidents.
lead_paragraph: Female officers regularly face sexual harassment by colleagues and superiors, and a fear of retaliation stops many from reporting incidents.
